metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10328 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
FreeType 2 before 2016-12-16 has an out-of-bounds write caused by a heap-based buffer overflow related to the cff_parser_run function in cff/cffparse.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10328` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.6.1-0.1ubuntu2.2
libfreetype6 - 2.6.1-0.1ubuntu2.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freetype package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-0.1ubuntu2.2').
